Reviews.Title: Great Camera but Dead Battery
Reviews.Author: Ian A. Guinta
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera until the battery died.  It wont even hold a charge now.Ive only had it a month!  I had this camera before and this didnt happen so I think I got a bad one.HELLO AMAZON send me a new Battery!!!

ProductInfo.Features:
10.2-megapixel sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality 18 x 24-inch prints
3x optical zoom; Digital Image Stabilization
Face Detection AF and AE
2.7-inch Intelligent LCD; Multi Slide Show function
Capture images to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SL-201 10.2MP Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Silver)
